name: window-commands
description: A GNOME extension written in TypeScript

scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run bundle && npm run copy-metadata
scripts.bundle: npm run bundle:extension && npm run bundle:cli
scripts.bundle:extension: tsc --project tsconfig.extension.json --outDir dist && mv dist/src/extension.js dist/ && rmdir dist/src
scripts.bundle:cli: tsc --project tsconfig.cli.json --outDir dist && mv dist/src/cli.js dist/ && chmod +x dist/cli.js
